short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a serene ocean wave background under a fiery red sunset, creating a dramatic and artistic scene for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your new tab with a serene ocean wave background set against a vibrant red sunset, creating a scene of mystery and depth. This backdrop provides a calming and focused atmosphere as you browse, blending the perfect harmony of colors with the tranquil beauty of the night ocean.
